vlive.korean: 연줄, 끈. a connection, a bond. 듣기 View video 10PM : 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! Movie talk!talk!

examples.korean: Given his political connections, he thought he was untouchable. 발음듣기 자신이 가진 정치적 연줄이 있으니 자기를 건드리지는 못하리라고 그는 생각했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Given his political connections, he thought he was untouchable. 발음

examples.korean: I’ve made some useful contacts in journalism. 발음듣기 나는 언론계 사람들 몇 명과 유용한 연줄을 맺어 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve made some useful contacts in journalism. 발음

examples.korean: I need contacts that could help in finding a job. 발음듣기 나는 취직을 하는 데 도움이 될 연줄이 필요하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I need contacts that could help in finding a job. 발음

examples.korean: One of my business connections gave them my name. 발음듣기 나와 사업상 연줄이 있는 곳 한 군데서 그들에게 내 이름을 알려주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: One of my business connections gave them my name. 발음

examples.korean: I would like to help you with locating a real estate agent here, but I really don't have any contacts in that area. 발음듣기 이곳에서 부동산중개인을 찾는 데 도움을 드리고는 싶지만, 저는 사실 그 분야에 연줄이 없습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I would like to help you with locating a real estate agent here, but I really don't have any contacts in that area. 발음
